value.string:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
 <Product xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/tal"
 xmlns:metal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/metal">
 <ItemSKU tal:content="options/reference">ScaleModel</ItemSKU>
 <Name tal:content="options/title">Chris Craft Kiade Model Boat</Name>
 <Description tal:content="options/description">There aren't many brands that are as sexy as Chris Craft.
 The world over, the Chris Craft name has become synonymous with powerboats.</Description>
 </Product>
